basics.name: Luca Sala
basics.label: PhD
basics.summary: Scientist with expertise in cardiac cellular electrophysiology, human induced pluripotent stem cell (hiPSC) technology, and precision medicine. Research activity focuses on disease modelling of inherited cardiac diseases, development of advanced electrophysiological technologies for phenotypic screening, and identification of novel therapeutic strategies for congenital and acquired arrhythmias, with a commitment to new approach methodologies (NAMs) as complementary methods to animal models.
